subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Humberto Suazo’s goal in the closing minute of the first half proved enough for the Mexican League champion Monterrey as it beat host Real Salt Lake, 1-0, to win the Concacaf Champions League and advance to the FIFA Club World Cup in December.
snippet: Humberto Suazo’s goal in the closing minute of the first half proved enough for the Mexican League champion Monterrey as it beat host Real Salt Lake, 1-0, to win the Concacaf Champions League and advance to the FIFA Club World Cup in December.
